overview: 20 years ago, a Bangladeshi named Kumbiwas attacked by a werewolf. Now in Malaysia, Kumbiis plotting to spread the werewolf curse and eliminate mankind. Pilun(ZizanRazak), a Bangladeshi working for UsopWilcha(Shy8) finds out about Kumbiâ€™splan and informs his employer. Will Kumbisucceed with his plans, or will UsopWilchasave the day?v
title: Werewolf Dari Bangladesh
